GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves an array of all articles

GET /api/articles.description: Returns an array of all articles with the properties: author, title, article_id, topic, created_at, votes, article_img_url, and comment_count (total number of comments for each article). Articles are sorted by date in descending order. The body property is excluded from the response.
